channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Subsystem for Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Subsystem for Linux

item.title: CVE-2018-0743|2024-09-17T03:38:57.180Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20subsystem%20for%20linux
item.description: Windows Subsystem for Linux in Windows 10 version 1703, Windows 10 version 1709, and Windows Server, version 1709 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory, aka "Windows Subsystem for Linux Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
